message: 'main' was deprecated in iOS 26.0: Use a UIScreen instance found through context instead (i.e, view.window.windowScene.screen), or for properties like UIScreen.scale with trait equivalents, use a traitCollection found through context.

'main' was deprecated in iOS 26.0: Use a UIScreen instance found through context instead (i.e, view.window.windowScene.screen), or for properties like UIScreen.scale with trait equivalents, use a traitCollection found through context.
